properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. FISHERMAN MISSING FROM VESSEL ON 25 JUL
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   04-56.30S 036-38.20W, 04-49.00S 036-51.50W,
   04-56.00S 036-54.50W, 05-04.00S 036-40.60W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1855/22.
